actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6(d)(1) of the Food Stamp Act of 1977, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to deny eligibility for food stamps to any household including a person participating in a strike or labor dispute which the President determines is causing or substantially contributing to: (1) a critical shortage of any essential energy resource or strategic material; or (2) unemployment in an industry not directly involved in such strike or labor dispute.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6(d)(1) of the Food Stamp Act of 1977, and for other purposes.
